name: Moonchild (itch)
description:
Fallen from the moon, stranded in a forest. A single path leading you toward destiny.

Moonchild is a (very) short  RPGmaker project made in the month of March 2021 out of sheer bordem. Also a desire to create, but who really cares about that, right? 

The game plays very much like a generic jRPG with a slight emphasis on conserving resources. I was only able to play test the game so much, and haven't had anyone else play through it, so it may be overly difficult/broken in some places and I wouldn't really know...

There's still a lot of RPGmaker default stuff present that I just haven't figured out how to change yet. Overall, don't take it too seriously.

Hope to make more games in the future though.

- I used the Yanfly core engine plugin for this project, though I'm not sure I actually utilized it in anyway. Still, credit is due.

Thank you for looking at this!

I have an Instagram if you want to check out my artwork when I actually post something - @difl.oo -
